metadata.Title: CVE-2021-42374 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.Description:
An out-of-bounds heap read in Busybox's unlzma applet leads to information leak and denial of service when crafted LZMA-compressed input is decompressed. This can be triggered by any applet/format that

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2021-42374` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

busybox - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
busybox-initramfs - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
busybox-static - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
busybox-syslogd - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
udhcpc - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
udhcpd - 1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: busybox package in impish was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:1.30.1-6ubuntu3.1').
